functionDecorators.name: getEpochStartTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns start timestamp of current epoch.

returnDecorators.description: getEpochStartTimestamp start timestamp of the current epoch.

functionDecorators.name: getMissedEpochPriceUpdates
functionDecorators.description: returns an array of info on each epoch price update that was missed. This function gets executed in a system update on the market contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _latestExecutedEpochIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the most recent epoch index in which a price update has been executed.

parameterDecorators.name: _previousOracleUpdateIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the "roundId" used to reference the most recently executed oracle price on chainlink.

functionDecorators.name: getOracleInfoForSystemStateUpdate
functionDecorators.description: Returns oracle information for executing historical epoch(s).

parameterDecorators.name: latestExecutedEpochIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the most recent epoch index in which a price update has been executed.

parameterDecorators.name: latestExecutedOracleRoundId
parameterDecorators.description: the "roundId" used to reference the most recently executed oracle price on chainlink.
